message.body: I have a word game I'd like to introduce if you want to add that to movie night. It's called salad bowl and is a hybrid of taboo and charades. We create a bank of words/phrases. There are 3 rounds where each team takes 1 minute turns. Pints are accumulated for correct guesses. Round 1 - members of a team must get their team to guess the word/phrase using whatever description. Once the bank is cleared move to round 2 - Taboo. Same thing and round 3 is charades all with the same bank. So you'll have to be very engaged. The game is very competitive and always yields the best laughs.
Well you found it! Are you going with the one near Drexel?
I am. It's a decent area and I like the apartment with its amenities
Are you at your sister's yet? I can only imagine your excitement of seeing the little darlings again.
Yup, I'm here. I didn't get to play with them much, they were on their way to a nap.
My b. And yay for time off!
There are so many keys to get into my new apartment lol
That's not necessarily a bad thing.
It isn't. Now I'll have to work on not forgetting anything when I leave the apartment. There's a key for the front gate, building, and then the apartment.
That would suck. I would get so annoyed having to go through all that if u forgot something.
*you
Imagine getting locked out!
Yeah that would be terrible. Almost home. Can't wait to take a nap then gotta get packing.
Sounds like a plan.
Debating on getting some bambu lol
I could go for a nap.
Awwwww you suck!
I would share but you're a littlllllle bit a way from here =P
Not nice.
I'll bring you some next time
Nope! Too little too late.
Enjoy your Bambu sir!
I didn't get any. I figured the mere mention of it would ruffle your feathers :)
I did however but some sweet buns from the mart
In the move for sweets?
It's in anticipation for the packing I'll be doing. And getting through the week.
Hey, no need to justify it for me. I just had tirimisu and it was delicious!
*tiramisu
I haven't had good tiramisu in a while.
Oh the one I just had was delicious!
Yay! Where was it from?
Harrah's.
I've never watched that video and I think I can keep it that way lol
Only the best stuff I hope!
More to nuzzle up on lolol
Like the casino?
Yes.
Gosh. I woke up and thought to myself, what day is it and where am I. That's exhaustion for ya lol
Did you sleep at your new apartment?
No I'm moving today. Just did initial packing last night. Finishing up soon. Picking up my brother to help out.
